mapper.insert: insert into zh_consignment_info ( consign_id, order_id, consign_no, freight_price, load_price, other_price, other_explain, total, remark, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted )values ( #{consignId}, #{orderId}, #{consignNo}, #{freightPrice}, #{loadPrice}, #{otherPrice}, #{otherExplain}, #{total}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now(), #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: update zh_consignment_info set consign_id=#{consignId}, order_id=#{orderId}, consign_no=#{consignNo}, freight_price=#{freightPrice}, load_price=#{loadPrice}, other_price=#{otherPrice}, other_explain=#{otherExplain}, total=#{total}, remark=#{remark}, status=#{status}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=#{createdTime}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_time=now(), is_deleted=#{isDeleted} where consign_id=#{consignId}

update zh_consignment_info
consign_id=#{consignId},
order_id=#{orderId},
consign_no=#{consignNo},
freight_price=#{freightPrice},
load_price=#{loadPrice},
other_price=#{otherPrice},
other_explain=#{otherExplain},
total=#{total},
remark=#{remark},
status=#{status},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime},
updated_by=#{updatedBy},
is_deleted=#{isDeleted},
updated_time=now()
where consign_id=#{consignId}
mapper.select: select consign_id, order_id, consign_no, freight_price, load_price, other_price, other_explain, total, remark, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted from zh_consignment_info where consign_id=#{consignId} and is_deleted ='00'

select zci.consign_id from zh_consignment_info zci inner join (zh_flow_status zfs inner join zh_flows zf on zfs.flow_id = zf.flow_id and zf.name = #{flowName}) on zfs.code = zci.status where zfs.type = #{statusType} and zci.order_id = #{orderId}

select consign_id, order_id, consign_no, freight_price, load_price, other_price, other_explain, total, remark, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted from zh_consignment_info where consign_id=#{consignId}
